commit message: OMG ADDED LOCKSCREEN WIDGET -- (code is a mess, though... fix it POH-LEASE)
Removed bug that suddenly unpaused if receiving an external sound
Made it so that connecting and disconnecting headsets makes the music player stop and play accordingly
Added Settings to configure the behavior of playing/pausing due to headphone connecting/disconnecting
Worst code ever conceived by mankind
Changed some graphics and added 'official' logo
Removed obsolete translation (gotta fix it later), changed a few strings and fixed a bug that prevented from skipping songs when onCompleted
Made possible for the user to activate/deactivate the ongoing notification Setting at runtime
Made possible to activate/deactivate lock screen widget (although requiring an app restart to apply)
